participant_1.background:

i love talking on the phone.

my name is todd.

participant_2.background:
I wish I could fly my model airplane without being afraid of crashing it.
i worry about money even though i am in high school.
I get by with my coffee and the books I read to fill the time between work and solitude.
I lost my job and had to move my family out of our house.
my feet are size six women s.

content.text: I'm doing alright, thanks for asking. How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm a student, and I'm trying to stay positive and focus on my studies.
That's great! I'm in high school, and I'm worried about money a lot.
I understand. Money can be a big stressor. What are you worried about?
I'm worried about not being able to afford college, and I'm worried about not being able to help my family.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure you'll be able to figure it out. You seem like a smart and capable person.
I am. I'm sure you'll be fine.
